name: tm44
effect: Teaches Rest to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Rest to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
The user sleeps for
2 turns to restore
health and status.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
The user sleeps for
2 turns to restore
health and status.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The user sleeps for
two turns to fully
restore HP and heal
any status problem.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user goes to sleep for two
turns. It fully restores the user’s HP
and heals any status problem.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:

This fully restores the user’s HP and
heals any status conditions.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user plays rough with the target and attacks it.
This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
If opposing Pokémon know any move also known by
the user, they are prevented from using it.
